Amount of Costs Per Year for Natural Disasters 1980 - 2024

Below is the average amount of costs of natural disaster per year for this time period. This is CPI-adjusted.

Drought

Severe Storm

Wildfire

Tropical Cyclone

34.3 Billion

Winter

Storm

Flooding

4.5 Billion

2.3 Billion

Freeze

The amount for the freeze column is: 800 million per year.

Source: National Centers for Environmental Information https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/access/billions/state-summary/US
